page.title: 17THE RAILWAY AT BALCOMBE
page.content:
{ THE RAILWAY NEAR BALCOMBE SCHOOL } THE LONDON TO BRIGHTON
In 1985 Balcombe School performed a play called "The Day that the Train Came by".The play was about when the first train came to Balcombe on the London to Brighton line that is just behind Balcombe School.the railway line was finished in 1841.Nowadays many of the trains pass through Balcombe without stopping,although at rush hour the platform is filled with commuters.Many adults from Balcombe work in London.There have recently been two accidents one of which was very serious.A train that was going too fast hit the edge of the platform near Balcombe station.Some of the wheels jumped onto the platform.This all happened at night.In the morning a crane on wheels came to clear away.
